title: Cant Connect After Champ Select
body: I was playing arams several hours ago with no problems at all, i come on several hours later to play ranked games with a friend and in both of them we get through champ select fine but it doesnt load in to game and comes up with a pop up saying 'cant connect to server' and to efectively sort my connection out, ive restarted LoL several times, restarted my internet and tried playing with and without ethernet cable in, i have 0 ideas wtf is wrong and ive now lost 40 lp aswell as gaining queue timers .... anyone got any idea on how to resolve this?

replies.body: It seems that your network is specifically unable to reach our game server.  This could be caused by some setting or firewall configuration, or something else.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to troubleshoot and restore comms.  You an also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings.  These resources should get you squared away!

they most likely will suggest to do their connectivity guide thing but i've been having the same issue and they suggested their hextech repair tool I have a post similar to this if you just want to find my post and get the links from there :) hope it helps you (didn't help me). But there working on a fix for sure lots of peeps are having the problem.
